sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie']) ~> sink1

transformations.name: AlterRow1
transformations.script:
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(year < 1900 || isNull(year)),
	updateIf(title == '20,000 Leagues Under the Sea')) ~> AlterRow1
